ANU.name: Chin Heng Low
interest: Psychological contracts, role identities, self-concepts, career stage transitions, motivation, and experiential learning.
ANU.biography: Chin Heng sees academia and working alongside industry partners as abundant blessings from God, and feels  thankful. When not busy at work, he visits the gym and goes for nature  walks. Chin Heng also loves travelling  with his wife to see the wonders of the  world and marvel at God's  creations.
project: Psychological contract preferences and career stage changes
Employee role identity and self-concept during career stage transitions

Microsoft-Academic.title: what do employees want and why an exploration of employees preferred psychological contract elements across career stages
a career stage perspective on employees preferred psychological contract contributions and inducements
